article.headline: Richmond 62, Prairie View 48
article.story: LOUISVILLE, Ky. (AP) -- Jermaine Bucknor scored 19 points, including a pair of 3-pointers during a decisive second-half run, as Richmond beat Prairie View 62-48 at the Colonial Classic on Sunday. Kevin Steenberge added 22 points and Richmond (4-2) bounced back from a 19-point loss to Arkansas State on Saturday by racing by the Panthers (1-4) in the second half. Jeremy Wiley led Prairie View with 15 points, but the Panthers couldn't sustain an early 14-point lead. Richmond ended the first half with an 18-5 run and took control early in the second half. Bucknor hit a 3-pointer to give the Spiders the lead for good less than four minutes into the second half. The Classic concludes on Monday when Prairie View plays Arkansas State and the Spiders face No. 7 Louisville.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
